title: Trump can't withhold University of California funding, judge rules
shortDescription: In a Nov. 14 ruling, a judge said the Trump administration had "engaged in coercive and retaliatory conduct in violation of the First Amendment."

title: Eric Trump reveals Barron Trump's inauguration comment to Joe Biden
shortDescription: Trump's youngest is a bit of a mystery. A handshake with Biden at inauguration spurred many theories. Here’s what Barron said, according to Eric Trump

title: Nicki Minaj teams up with Donald Trump's UN ambassador. Here's why.
shortDescription: Rejected by some in the rap industry in recent years, Nicki Minaj – the genre's most famous woman – has embraced insiders in the Trump administration.

title: Coalition led by Planetary Society show support of Trump's NASA pick
shortDescription: A coalition led by the Planetary Society has voiced its support for Jared Isaacman, President Donald Trump's pick to lead NASA.

title: 'I'm still grieving.' Thomas Massie on Trump mocking his new marriage
shortDescription: Kentucky Rep. Thomas Massie's longtime wife died last year. Amid his recent remarriage, President Donald Trump attacked him online.

title: Washington Monument gives new look at White House East Wing construction
shortDescription: The newly reopened tourist attraction offers scenes of the White House construction

title: President Trump planning on meeting NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters Zohran Mamdani wanted to come to DC for a meeting and he would 'work something out.' He's bashed the mayor-elect

title: House is expected to vote on Epstein files. What could be released?
shortDescription: The House is expected to hold a vote Nov. 18 on a bill that would force the DOJ to release files on Jeffrey Epstein and related investigations.

title: Trump says he would sign Epstein files bill if Congress passes it
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reversed course and backed a House bill that's expected to get a vote Tuesday forcing DOJ to release its Jeffrey Epstein files.

title: Trump open to talking to Maduro
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he is open to speaking to Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro amid rising tension with the country.

title: Trump wants Epstein files released
shortDescription: In a stunning reversal, President Trump posted on Truth Social that Republicans should release the Epstein files.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump drops a MAGA ally
shortDescription: The president withdraws endorsement of Marjorie Taylor Greene. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: Indiana lawmaker victim of swatting after Trump criticism on social media
shortDescription: A fake report brought authorities to the home of Indiana state Sen. Greg Goode hours after President Donald Trump called him out over redistricting.

title: In stark reversal, Trump says House GOP should vote to release Epstein files
shortDescription: In a stunning reversal, President Donald Trump called on House Republicans to vote for the full release of files related to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Americans think the GOP won shutdown negotiations, new poll says. Here's why
shortDescription: The results come in stark contrast to polls taken amid the shutdown that showed Republicans shouldering the brunt of voter criticism.

title: Why are Donald Trump and Marjorie Taylor Greene fighting? Here's the story.
